Class EventHandler

  • public class EventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    EventHandler class
    Author:
    EugenioCortesi class the reads a new event, parse the type and select the right checks to do.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public boolean handle(EventChecker eventChecker)
        this method is called from the RoundsHandler: it's used to say if the client action can be done or not. it parses the id action and calls the specific action checks. tokens for card usage are payed only if the action is done.
        Parameters:
        eventChecker - instance of eventChecker object
        Returns:
        the boolean returned is the ultimate acceptance of the action
